title: Dhaka Road Cleaning Drive
details: This community clean-up event aims to raise awareness about hygiene and the importance of keeping our surroundings clean. Volunteers will work together to remove waste, sweep the roadsides, and place trash in proper disposal bins. The event also includes a short awareness session on sustainable waste management.

title: Tree Plantation for Green Bangladesh
details: Join us in planting over 200 saplings around Dhanmondi Lake to promote a greener and healthier environment. Participants will learn about the importance of increasing urban greenery, the right way to plant trees, and how to take care of young plants. This event encourages community involvement in building a sustainable future.

title: Free Health Checkup Camp
details: A free medical camp offering basic health checkups including blood pressure, diabetes screening, BMI measurement, and eye testing. Qualified doctors and medical students will be present to provide consultations. This event aims to assist underprivileged communities who have limited access to proper healthcare facilities.

title: Educational Workshop for Street Children
details: A heartwarming initiative to support street children by providing them basic educational activities such as reading, writing, drawing, and storytelling. Volunteers will engage in interactive learning sessions, distribute notebooks and pencils, and conduct fun activities to boost their interest in learning.

title: Dhaka Charity Marathon
details: A citywide marathon that brings together runners from all backgrounds to support flood-affected families. Participants can choose from 5km, 10km, and 20km categories. The event includes hydration points, medical support stations, and a medal ceremony for all finishers. Funds collected will be donated directly to relief organizations.

title: Cycling for Awareness
details: A scenic 15 km cycling event along the Cox's Bazar beach road to promote fitness and mental well-being. Participants will enjoy the refreshing sea breeze while spreading awareness about the importance of regular physical activity. Safety marshals and refreshment stops will be available throughout the route.

title: Winter Clothes Distribution
details: Help us distribute winter clothing, blankets, and warm jackets to homeless individuals and day laborers who struggle during the cold season. Volunteers will assist in sorting donations, distributing the items, and talking to recipients to understand their needs better. Together, we can make winter a little warmer for them.

title: Blood Donation Program
details: A voluntary blood donation drive organized to support local hospitals in Sylhet. Certified medical teams will be present to ensure safe donation procedures. Donors will receive health checkups beforehand and refreshments afterward. Your contribution can save lives â€” join and encourage others to donate.

title: Photography Walk
details: A guided photography walk exploring the historical heritage of Old Dhaka. Participants will visit iconic locations, capture architectural details, and learn street photography techniques. This event is perfect for both beginners and professional photographers seeking inspiration in vibrant cultural surroundings.

title: Community Park Cleanup
details: A community-driven cleanup initiative focused on removing waste, trimming overgrown plants, and restoring the natural beauty of Ramna Park. Volunteers will work in teams to ensure a cleaner and greener environment for everyone to enjoy.

title: Public Health Awareness Camp
details: A health awareness program offering free checkups, basic diagnostics, and expert consultations. Participants will receive guidance on nutrition, exercise, mental wellness, and preventive healthcare to promote a healthier lifestyle.

title: Charity Book Fair
details: A charity book fair aimed at promoting literacy and supporting underprivileged students. Visitors can donate books, buy from a wide selection of affordable titles, and participate in reading sessions and storytelling activities.
